name: Bunny Love
description:
Important! The competition!
The game has no end! But the hole is limited. If you escape and send me foto, I buy you a beer on Slavic Game Jam 2020 (or TK Game Jam 2020, come to us!). 

SHOW ME THE POWER OF LOVE! Good luck! :>

Game Core Description:
You have to learn the bunny to escape a hole. They must to cooperate!
1. If you start play, you control first bunny. The bunny remember your input!
2. If you click "Space", the bunny ends learning and transforming to platform.
3. But you start controlling next bunny :>
4. All earlier bunnies are moving like in the past (input, not position)

Controls:
Left Arrow, Right Arrow - moving
Up Arrow - jumping
Space - transforming to platform, taking control to next bunny
R - fully restart game

Author: 

Bartłomiej "rivFox" Jarosz
